action.action-desc: Ms. Meng introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To require the creation and maintenance of a MadeInAmerica.gov website.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the MadeInAmerica.gov Act.

subsection.text: Not later than 2 years after the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Commerce shall create and maintain a MadeInAmerica.gov website where consumers can find information about products that are made in America.
The Secretary shall issue such regulations as are necessary to implement this Act.
